snippet: A string of recent crimes on Roatán, the largest of the Bay Islands, has prompted outrage, and efforts are underway to improve safety.
abstract: Dave Seminara article says a string of recent crimes on Roatan, the largest of Honduras's Bay Islands, has prompted outrage, and efforts are underway to improve safety; notes watch committees are being set up.
lead_paragraph: A string of recent crimes on Roatán, the largest of the Bay Islands, has prompted outrage, and efforts are underway to improve safety.

headline.main: Security Concerns on a Honduran Island
